website_summaries.verdict: When the whole family needs to leave their phones at the charger during dinnertime, this 6 port charger is the one that can accommodate.
pros: 12 amps and 60 watts overall make this the powerhouse option, able to charge 6 devices simultaneously
All ports are equipped with PowerIQ and VoltageBoost Technology for the fastest possible charge
cons: Incompatible devices can overload the ports and can cause premature failure
Be sure to check for compatibility with your devices

customer_reviews.title: Great as long as you are not charging an Apple product
customer_reviews.text: This item will charge multiple items as long as one is not an iPhone. An iPhone will only charge if it is the only device.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Noble

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped working shortly after purchasing it. I didn't realize it wasn't working I just thought it was my USB cable. I switched the USB cable and after awhile it stopped working again. I'd plug my phone in and it seemed to be charging but in the morning it was only at 20%. By the time I realized the charger was defective it was too late to return it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Becker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I am leaving the exact same review for all three items I purchased to make this beautiful look happen! I finally committted to making a cleaner dining room table. Using a hollow bamboo dock and purchasing the anker 6 port charging block along with generic 6 in cables made this look SO much better and safer for the kiddo since long cords are no longer dangling! Including a before and after.
customer_reviews.author: A consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable product, GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great. Product works most of the time. Worst part is, it doesn't work all of the time. I purchased to charge multiple devices at a time. When charging my iPhone 8, it will quit charging (some of the time). Did the same thing for an iPad Mini 3. I used different cables that I was previously charging with (and no problems). Very convenience, just not reliable. —————- Two days after posting about my faulty product, customer service offered to send a new one. The new one arrived a few days later and is worker better so far. Even if this product fails, I will continue to use their products due to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Anker Warranty Is Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I never have felt compelled to leave a review before, but don't bother buying if you are purchasing because of Anker's warranty. They make is very difficult to use the warranty. My time is far more valuable than how much of it they want. It's not enough to have the order from Amazon, and purchased directly from them. If you didn't save all of the boxes the came in, with a serial number on them, the warranty is worthless. And yes, as a customer that has bought close to a hundred cables from them, and couldn't get five covered under warranty, I will be leaving this review on every one of my purchases from Anker.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Quick Charge Samsung Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking from the description that it would quick charge the Galaxy S8. Nope! Crummy and misleading description. Stay Away. I thought the first one was defective and so I got a replacement from Amazon. It does not work either. That make me think it simply does not quick charge the Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.author: Click Mann

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last and certain don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about three years now and mainly use it for traveling to charge multiple devices. With minimal daily use, certain ports just don’t work anymore, it’s trial and error. A port may work for about a couple of seconds and as you walk it, the port ceases to charging waking up to some dead devices.
customer_reviews.author: IL Buyer

customer_reviews.title: fast charges all my devices
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quick and powered all my devices and quick charged. Consistently provides over 1000ma to multiple devices. After a week it completely quit with no power at all. Contacted Anker and they next day shipped me a replacement which has been working great. I use Anker products exclusively and after being provided exceptional customer service I will continue to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeron Crockett

customer_reviews.title: individually isolated circuits, awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has individually isolated circuits for each USB port, look at the pictures of the inside of the unit. Each one is 2amps and does not take away from the output of the others (some on here are 2 amps COLLECTIVELY) I use this to charge two Valve Index controllers, and three body trackers for VR. It's... Perfect. No annoyingly bright LEDs, nothing stupid, it is a solid little unit, no noise output and it just works. It's perfect and more than expected.
customer_reviews.author: SqweezelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: This item has great reviews because most of the reviews are submitted the day that it comes out of the box. The value of an electronic item is how long it will last before problems arise. I purchased this item on Amazon 18 months ago. It has stopped working. The electronics rapidly blink as though they're being unplugged, replugged, over and over. It drains the battery of the electronic rather than charging it. I contacted the company, thinking that any quality company would stand by its product after only 18 months, but I was told that I was outside of the window. It's the last Anker item I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Can charge 6 devices and keep them charged while in use
customer_reviews.text: I have started using Anker equipment for all my iPhone/iPad/iPod requirements about 2 years back and am very happy with they products, cables as well as wall chargers. These items just work and don't wear out like some of the other similar items often do. I highly recommend them. This charger supports up to 6 devices at the same time and has no shortage of power to recharge them in a reasonable about of time and then keeps them charged as long as they are plugged in while being used. I have one in my bedroom for iPod, iPhone and iPad and one is my study for several devices and never had any issues/
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ruprecht

customer_reviews.title: Best multi-port high power charger hands down - Charge 6 iPads no sweat
customer_reviews.text: Unit doesn't ever get hot, and we attach all sorts of high draw devices at the same time to it, with iPads, iPhones, and the occasional travel battery pack, sometimes all at once. Don't let the great price fool you, it is 2A per port for all six ports, you can't find a better value for charging multiple devices at the same time without current division across the ports. 10 port units often have the same overall current as this box. Anker makes great gear, built to last, and I don't worry about what I'm connecting to it for how long.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bach

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months, 3 ports have died. :(
customer_reviews.text: So I love Anker products and own probably at least a dozen or more. My other Anker chargers work great, but this one with the 6 ports... 3 of the ports have died and I just had this delivered in June. I hate to stick this in the landfill after only 4 months, but only 3 of the 6 ports still work. We only charge iPhones and iPads, so I am not sure what’s causing the problem. :(
customer_reviews.author: StevenUniverse

customer_reviews.title: Check compatibility with your device!!!
customer_reviews.text: While this item appeared to be of great quality, I did call the manufacture Anker to confirm that this device does NOT stop providing the rapid charge once your device is fully charged. Many of the devices allegedly will only allow a trickle charge once fully charged, but even 2 Samsung tech reps said that they have nothing in writing confirming that on the earlier galaxy models prior to the S7 will do this and they recommend ONLY factory charges. I tried this charger and it caused a couple phones batteries to get very hot that were listed on their compatibility chart so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 ports work, also If you mixed micro ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 ports work, also If you mixed micro usb b and type C devices together, the device with usb type C won't charge
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schultz

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite USB chargers
customer_reviews.text: Long time fan of Anker products. Great products at a decent price. Great quality and Apple certified so you do your have to worry it ruining your device. With 6 ports, you can charge everything from phones, to tablets to watches and headphones, and it will also only take up one wall outlet. It will charge your iPhone faster since it’s charging at 10W rather than the 5W adapter that Apple gives you.
customer_reviews.author: GS ReviewTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: So many things to charge in limited space
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple Anker products - charging cables to bluetooth speakers - and they are great! But this little guy is fantastic. It helps to put all my charging cords in one place. Everything charges well and is so much more tidy than trying to find space for power adapters. The only complaint (and it really isn't a complaint) is that the indicator light is very bright in a dark bedroom. I remedied that by putting a small piece of black electrical tape over it. I'd buy another one in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't charge multiple devices as quickly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our device charging station. With a few devices plugged in and charging we quickly noticed it wasn't charging as fast if we only charge one device. We reached out to Anker support and they haven't gotten back to us. A little disappointed with this transaction and experience. We assume this is defective, but can't seem to get a response from their tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Griffin

customer_reviews.title: traveler, multiple port amazingness
customer_reviews.text: use this daily for charging a verity of Apple, Android, baby monitor etc devices all at once, one at a time, so on. always functions well no issues. when I travel it makes it easy to charge everyone's phone and other devices all on one plug. wish the cord that goes from Wall to device was better and connector was smaller or sideways on the plug to make it more square other then both sides requiring lots of space and having cables jet out of each side. this would protect the cable from being jammed up to a wall which it constantly is or break because of the jamming. Also would help save on desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Muhlestein

customer_reviews.title: Handles large charging draws without issue
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a cheap discount store charging hub. My wife always complained her phone wouldn't charge so I experimented and found if more than 1 device was plugged in, nothing would charge. Got this hub and now her phone shows "rapid charge" even with our alarm clock, my phone, a tablet and Bluetooth headphones all plugged in. I wanted to make sure it could handle the demand, so I made sure all the devices had low or dead batteries. Moral of the story, is spend a little more and get a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: midockman

customer_reviews.title: 6 ports 2+ amps each
customer_reviews.text: I needed a charger for vacation for ours and kids devices. Loved using Anker batteries, so thought would give their charger a try. The charger did not disappoint. I was able to charge 2x Pixel 4s, 1x Pixel 3 XL, and 1 LG phone in quick time thanks to the power. The power cable is long enough so I can move the charger to some place decent to charge devices. The unit does NOT come with any charging cables for phones (and I would not expect it to either, so not knocking off stars for that). I ended up buying 2 of these. One for home and one for travelling and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying these!
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced almost all of my USB wall warts with these...they also work on European power, so they are great for travelling...I have one in my suitcase, one on nightstand, two in office, wife has one in her craft room... I have had them for a few years and no problems yet...they output plenty of power but don't skimp on usb cables...I also got a bunch of the Anker Powerline USB cables. I run quite a few Rasberry Pi's and other USB devices. I tested my old cables and these power supplies with a USB load tester. This power supply and good USB cables can power a bunch of PI's by itself.
customer_reviews.author: mark twain

customer_reviews.title: Best Multi Chargers
customer_reviews.text: Not all chargers are the same. Take the guess work out of making your decision like does this charger or that charger have enough wattage to charge my gizmos? This Anker 60w charger is powerful enough to charge anything you have and several at the same time. Can't go wrong here. I own six of these and have them setup all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss customer service...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few of Anker Lightning cables and a coupe of chargers for home and car. Recently had issue with one that was just 9 days out of warranty it would only charge up to a certain precent and then all of my apple devices would say not charging tried different cables and everything charged fully. Mind you it is 18 month warranty and when purchasing from Amazon there is a delay between the start of the warranty and actual receiving and starting to use the product. Anker would not budge on the warranty. Disappointed and researching other brands to replace the Anker products I own now.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, for more than one person's charging needs.
customer_reviews.text: Great charging capacity, first of all. I can charge 3 or 4 things simultaneously, and they all seem to get their full amps/watts. It does get warm if I do this, but not overly. Easy to strip down for packing, and to setup in hotel room. Charging 2 headsets and 2 smartphones and 1 iPad worked great. I have 2 of these, one for travelling, and one that stays on my bedside table, with 1 iPad cable and 3 microUSB cables, so I'm ready to charge phone, headset(s) and iPad at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: tinyNorman

customer_reviews.title: Love the amount of ports
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of electronic devices in my house and previously it would use up a lot of my outlets trying to charge all these devices at the same time. Having 6 ports in 1 outlet is a huge convenience for me. The last Anker charger I had died after a couple years so I hope this one lasts longer. The one thing I would recommend is you also buy some kind of cable management organizer as having 6 wires coming out of this thing looks like a mess if it's unorganized.
customer_reviews.author: Carfo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my bamboo device charging station. Charges fast, and keeps everything organized. I haven’t tried to charge six devices all at once while timing it, but let’s just say it’s been sufficient for my needs (intermittently charging an Apple watch, AirPods, iPad Pro, Bose headphones, usb fan, and iPhone). Altogether, very satisfied. Would recommend for most average use people. Cannot speak for intense gamers and tech-overloaded people.
customer_reviews.author: wheatbix

customer_reviews.title: But after a month I use this unit with a DC power inverter a 400 watt to use as a charging station for my Uber passengers. And in about 45 minutes someone used ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a month before writing a review. But after a month I use this unit with a DC power inverter a 400 watt to use as a charging station for my Uber passengers. And in about 45 minutes someone used a iPhone 7 charger and went from 80% to 97%, while using their phone to send emails and browse Facebook. My passenger is really like the fast charging capability specially on a short trip. The unit does heat up a little bit but it's not extremely hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: paul m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every family with lots of digital devices, six ports is great.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for every family with lots of digital devices. Powers all IPADS, ANDROID Tablets,phones, TOM TOMs, Cameras, powerbanks etc.. as described. Two Velcro cable managers are included in the package — one for the wall cable, one for your other cables — and a single soft blue light lets you know that the unit’s powered on. Supply your own cables. i recommend quality cables from Anker of OEM cables from your Phone/Tablet as weaker/cheaper/thinner cable will have negative impact on charging time. . This thing always goes on a trip to the airport, there are always too few wall-outlets. Unit does not get hot, just slighty warm, touchable at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vacations!
customer_reviews.text: I was travelling to Europe and needed a way of charging all different gadgets that the family takes... tablets, phones, etc. All at once at night. We already have the Anker Wall charger that attaches directly to the wall. The beauty about this one is that it comes with a detachable cable; that makes it very easy to travel with it. You stay within US? Use original cable. You go to Europe? Just buy a 2-prong cable that works in Europe (for instance, like this one from amazon:  No more chargers, no more adapters! Quality is the usual from Anker, always delivering (have multiple chargers from them)
customer_reviews.author: Xavi

customer_reviews.title: Charge It!
customer_reviews.text: The Anker 60W 6-Port Wall Charger is one of the best portable device chargers thus far. Be advised that cheep charging cables use smaller gauge wires in their cables that cause the charging unit to work harder to charge the device and will take longer to charge the portable device. Get good USB cables that have 21 Gauge power wires and 28 Gauge data wires for fast charging through the Anker 60W 6-Port Wall Charger and you will find that the charger will have your portable device charged in no time even while you are using it.
customer_reviews.author: PupBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The unit has a lot of positives and has really only had one negative so far. For the good stuff. I have charged 3 different generations of Fire tablet and an iPad Pro with zero complaints. As a tablet charger, it's a very solid buy. The only complaint I have is that I have an eCig that occasionally gets kind of warm when I charge it. It's never gotten warm enough for me to be concerned and there's a chance it's because the cable I got with it is letting too much current flow. I'm going to try some cables I trust and may update my review based on how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but works fine
customer_reviews.text: It’s a heavy charger, the cable it’s a little uncomfortable since it’s not long enough to be useful but it is to occupy a lot of space. Not a fast charger at all, I thought I’ll be but was disappointed in that. The second time I used it already showed scars on it, so it’s not so good on it’s surface. I use my iPhone without protection and has no scratches just to be clear of how I treat my stuff. In the end I do think it’s at least 10 USD overpriced. It works fine, it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Apple level of quality & support
customer_reviews.text: This is our new kitchen counter charging station. Plenty of power to charge phones, camera & tablets. Well designed recyclable packaging, nice presentation. Clean design. No complaints so far. Update: After about 9 months, it quit working (rather subtlety I might add). It would charge for about 10 minutes or so, them just quit. You might gain 10% or 15% increase in charge level, then nothing. Time to talk to Anker warranty. Update 2: Anker honored their warranty with no issues. The replacement unit is working fine. Great support is a major reason for my continuing to choose their products.
customer_reviews.author: ZBC

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but I was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but you can clearly tell the difference between the fast charging from the OEM charger and this unit, at least for the S9+. Don’t get me wrong, it charges fast, but I was expecting the same “speed” as the OEM charger. I have one unit from another manufacturer (aukey) that seems to charge pretty much as fast as the OEM charger, hence is why I’m a little disappointed with this. But if you don’t need to be super fast, it works really well for multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Joao

customer_reviews.title: easy fix if needed as long as you know how ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really a 5 Star product. I only gave it 4 due to a slightly weak power cable socket. It is really only secured by the welds on the circuit board. as a result some bending action on the plug will result in the welds cracking and the unit no longer working. I opened mine and re soldered the plug on the board. easy fix if needed as long as you know how to solder. This should not be an issue at all as long as you unplug the power cable when you take it with you on travels. A must have item if you have many iThings to charge at the same time/over night. Great charger!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best charging station on the market
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I would like to say that I absolutely love Anker products and own over 10 of them. This charging station is awesome. Use the Anker cable for extra fast charging times. This product helps you saves space and keep all of your devices organized, so it is definitely good for homes multiple devices. I will always support the Anker brand and this product does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: We keep getting more and more devices that use USB charging and most have a separate charging block or need to be plugged into a USB port on your computer. Using this charging station provides a means to centralize charging capability and the ability to keep multiple charging cable types in one location. No more searching for the right cable for your device. Excellent, solidly built product by Anker!
customer_reviews.author: DQ Voices

customer_reviews.title: we don't have to bring a bunch of dongles and adapters now which is great.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an high amperage USB charger for travel. This fits the bill perfectly. I charged two smartphones, two tablets, a camera, and an Anker 20100mAh external battery on this and everything charged quickly. Each port can handle 2.4A and it adjusts itself based on what's connected to it. When we travel, we don't have to bring a bunch of dongles and adapters now which is great. Edit: In my review I said each port can handle 2.4A. This is true, but the device is 12A max, so if you have all six ports connected to higher power-draw devices, they'll only be averaging 2A at best.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget there is a switch on the back
customer_reviews.text: I was getting ready to write a review about how it broke a few months after we got it. I was going to take it apart and figure out what was wrong, when I noticed It has a switch on the back and it was off. Oops! Don't forget there is a switch on the back! Other than that, it works fine. It's a pretty good size for the power level and it looks good, for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, expected better from Anker
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to say about this one. From my S7 and my iphone 6s, this charger takes hours to get to 100%. I've started charging my S7 from 50% and it still slated the estimated time that it would take as 3 1/2 hours... so 7 hours if I had started from 0%? Usually when I get something like this I dig a little deeper, but I don't have the time I used to to put in the investigation time. Overall, pretty disappointed with the outcome of this one. Will be sending back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: TiHoP

customer_reviews.title: Great charger.  Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Had a Bolse (they seem to be gone now) 7 port charger that gave up the ghost. Couldn't find them to try for a warranty replacement so wanted to get another brand. Anker has been a staple product for years and they seem like they are here to stay. So picked up 2 of them. Great feel (nice and heavy) and no external power supply. This just works and is very compact for ease of travel. The only problem is that now I have to get more USB charging cords =)
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Not without issues.
customer_reviews.text: I needed another charger and since I was buying one I wanted to make sure I got one that had a bit more power than my others. Anker usually makes quality stuff. While this does charge most things I need it to, it refuses to charge the Nintendo Switch Pro Controller (the controller, not the console itself). Tech support says "they don't speak the same language" and while that may be the case, this is the only charger I have that won't charge it. That coupled with having to reset the ports every so often make this a charger that I just wouldn't buy again or recommend, even though it's a decent basic charger.
customer_reviews.author: W. Harp

customer_reviews.title: Great for Charging a lot of Devices
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these Anker wall chargers that we have bought. The first one sits in my office to charge a lot of the devices that I use for work (keyboard, mouse, iPhone, iPad, etc.). The second one sits in our landing space for all of the family phones and tablets. We use this device in conjunction with a plastic paper stand/file stand that would sit on someone's desk and it makes for a great charging station.
customer_reviews.author: IERF

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm...
customer_reviews.text: I already have some of their other models, but USB devices seem to keep proliferating, so this was an extra upgrade. Couldn't be easier to use, really. Plug the power in at one end, and plug the devices in at the other. Their other products have been working well for me, and I have no reason to suspect that this will be any different
customer_reviews.author: Phil Buglass

customer_reviews.title: Anker products are my Go-to!
customer_reviews.text: Anker is my favorite brand when it comes to electronics like this. This charging block is exactly what I needed in my life, I was so tired of swapping out charging blocks and having to use extension cords. I’ve purchased multi port chargers before for them to either not work, barely charge, or burn out within a week. After being fed up for so long, I waiting several years before giving them another shot and letting technology get better. Anker is my go-to and I’m glad they put out great products.
customer_reviews.author: David R Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: This unit fits easily into a narrow corner of my desk
customer_reviews.text: This unit fits easily into a narrow corner of my desk. It provides ample Power ports for many devices or plug-in needs. I like that it can be used as shown or can easily be placed flat with plug-ins in that direction. In either configuration, plug-ins are quick and easily made. I tend to forget that it is there until I need it. It is convenient having more Ports than other models may provide. I have never maxed it out with six inputs but I'm confident it would take them easily. In my experience this is a great product. A+
customer_reviews.author: Bannis

customer_reviews.title: It's a usb charger, what more to say?
customer_reviews.text: It charges my stuff quickly, it's aesthetic, and it does what it's advertised, not much to say. Only con I can think of is portability (albeit I never bought this to carry around). It has a cord (it disconnects), but it is 2 parts, which I would find a mild inconvenience. Other than that, it is what it is, not much to say. It works
customer_reviews.author: zee.rowe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge MacBookPro at full 60W, only 30W!
customer_reviews.text: I have a USB-C MacBook Pro (retina, touchbar). I was really excited about this charger instead of the built in Apple one since it is more sleek. However, sadly it only charges at 30W (see attached screenshot) which doesn't actually feed it enough power to stay charged. I tried with an official Apple usb-c cable that came with my 65W USBc charger and still no dice. Sad to see. I tried to contact them for support through Amazon but for some reason the product isn't eligible for support either! (see screenshot). I don't know if its a faulty unit or a problem with the device itself which is overselling the 60W charging capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Anand X.

customer_reviews.title: Anker is reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I baught this to set inside of my wooden charge station / organizing rack. Using a pack of use charge cables i baught (also by anker) this has turned unto the best bedside charge station ever. Currently I have a Kindle Fire HD 10, Samsung Galaxy S9, 8bitdo SN30pro, a pair of wirelesss heasphones, power bank, and a powered stylus all plugged into this device. No issues at all. 8nfact all my devices charge at their own pace, ensuring nothing is overcharged or slow charging. I'm a huge Anker fan, and have baught around 7 or 8 different products. I understand random cases of deffective items can happen, but for me everything i've ordered has worked flawlessly!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Well built, I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these based on a relative's recommendation. Well built, provides max USB power, and in a small compact size. The other nice feature is the switching power supply doesn't get hot when loading this unit. Yea, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TXAZ, real human reviewer, got this from Amazn

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well, convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have five small timer units that need charging all at once. This charger made that very easy. Before getting this charger, I had to rotate through the units, charging only two at a time. That took a lot of time and attention. Now I just plug all of them in and walk away. They are all done at the same time with no hassles.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A.

customer_reviews.title: So handy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to keep all my chargeable item together in one place and with this charger it makes it easy. I leave all my chargeable wire plugged in and I've taken the charger along on a short trip and just brought everything. I know where all the cords are and the charger makes it easy. My items do seem to charge somewhat quicker too. Happy....
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: These are a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I personally have 2 of these, and my husband also has one. I keep 1 next to my computer to have easy access to charge phones, tablets, cameras, battery chargers, etc. I have an extra I keep just for travel so plugging in and keeping everything charged is super easy. They are a must have if you have multiple things to keep charged! Love, Love, Love this item!! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Momma G

customer_reviews.title: Charges anything we have
customer_reviews.text: This keeps all of our charging in one spot instead of a bunch of separate wall transformers. Headphones, keyboards, any tablets, phones, portable batteries, speakers...whatever device now has one spot and it handles it. Coil up ten cables and this charger. Power button on back and LED in front so you know the charger is on.
customer_reviews.author: thisandthat

customer_reviews.title: Multiple usb outlet charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 5 slot usb charger that I’ve had for 5 years. I loaned it to my mother in law while she was in the hospital. She loved it and I didn’t have the heart to take it back. My wife and I love it for traveling. One outlet plug can charge 6 devices, phones, watches or IPads. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thow away your other chargers.
customer_reviews.text: This can charge 3 phones, at the same time, to a full charge in less that 2 hours, including 2 Samsung Galaxy 9+ with single digit charger levels left, without turning on the fast charge option and will slow down the charge rate when you get near the 100% charge. Great for external 10,000 ma phone batteries also, but you will need to user a real phone cord and not the wimpy cables most batteries come with.
customer_reviews.author: David Black

customer_reviews.title: Does not work after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Second one I had... keep it next to my bed for charging my iPhone and iPad. Just stopped working after 9 months same as the last one. I guess they expect you to but a new one every every 9-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth voigt

customer_reviews.title: Ports stop functioning, but service is great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in July, 2017. By February 2018, most of the ports stopped working. I am quite disappointed that it didn't even last a year. Only the bottom 2 ports are currently functioning. We didn't overuse it either and it is kept inside a wooden organizer, so it barely gets any dust. I am surprised about the high reviews it is getting. 4/4/2018: Anker contacted me to reevaluate the product. The gesture is appreciated. I'll update the review upon further testing. 4/10/2018: We received the product. Rating up because of the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Along with their power core battery chargers this is also one of the most used items in our home. We have two "charging stations" for our family in our house. There are enough ports to allow for multiple cables, we use 3 lighting, 2 usb micro and 1 usb c cables. We normally have anywhere from 2-6 devices attached and it will charge them quickly. Another must have product for the tech family.
customer_reviews.author: anthony2823Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: It got all the features and USB slots that I need for all the devices we owned in my family when I am traveling. It saves time especially when the hotel doesn't usually have that many wall plugs for charging all the devices we owned. It is a bit pricey compare to other brand but it is one of the well-known brand so it commands a bit higher price than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Su

customer_reviews.title: The very best for travel for us!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for travel, but would work great in other souses. The hotels electrical outlets are often shot from over use, so this helps with the single plug in and no weight pulling on it....we love it. Also bought the same company usb cords which has 18 month warranty. Well work the $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: ESP

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: It's fixed to my night table with the double-sided foam tape that came in the package. The ports are maybe a little too close together, but I haven't had any trouble plugging and unplugging. All of the ports charge appropriately, and it never feels hot to touch even when charging six devices at once.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: We have two now!
customer_reviews.text: These are super convenient for charging multiple USB devices at the same time. We've had one running for about a year and it's charged dozens of devices simultaneously. We were so impressed we bought another for our office.
customer_reviews.author: 1a

customer_reviews.title: This is a great charger
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this charger. I had bought on from another storr that wasn't able to normally charge (it would charge but slowly) my laptop or my Switch, so I had to use another charger to charge those two. Not anymore. This one has enough power to charge everything I own without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: BenC

customer_reviews.title: Must have multi port charger
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller then I expected, but that's not a con at all. This is such a convenient multi charger. I'm currently running a 4 bay battery charger for 18650-21700 batteries and it works just as fast, if not faster then when plugged into the wall. Also have 3 other things that are plugged into it off and on during the day and it charges everything great.
customer_reviews.author: steven chaloux

customer_reviews.title: I love Anker products
customer_reviews.text: Since I have more than 10-12 devices, this Anker charger is worth to keep in your inventory since it helps you to charge all the devices quickly and supports 6 extensions at a time. I travel a lot and there is always a fight when we share the hotel rooms due to limited to power outlets, but, I don’t need all, just one. I already own a portable power bank from Anker so I had no doubt in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad F

customer_reviews.title: Great for a centralized charge station.
customer_reviews.text: I've always complained about 3 or 4 chargers using that many outlets. This one has 6 ports high current ports and uses one 90 to 240 volt outlet. I put 5 devices on it and the all drew their max current for a rapid charge. I've used it in Hong Kong, Thailand and of course stateside.
customer_reviews.author: TGWOH

customer_reviews.title: One outlet? No problem for this Anker USB 6-Port USB Charger.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect traveling companion if you use multiple USB devices on the road. This is great traveling solo or not. No need to look for outlets around the hotel room to plug in your devices. Plug this into one wall outlet and you are able to connect 6 USB devices and charge at the same time. The Anker 60W 6-Port USB wall charger is portable, I pack it in my Electronics Travel Organizer Bag with the rest of my electronic accessories and I am ready for the road.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger
customer_reviews.text: My husband built a charging station out of wood that will hold 5 devices. I ordered this charger which fits in nicely on the underside. Ordered some cables to go with it and we were in business. Has been working great for us. We're able to charge our devices in one spot and keep them out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Wineaux7100

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: So this thing is way tinier than expected. Came with a little thing for cable management. It's surprisingly powerful. I'm currently charging my battery hog phone, my smart watch and my Kindle Paperwhite with no lag issues. I might have to buy another one for the other room. Will update if there are any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Great device, great company
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Anker PowerPort (three different models /sizes) , for straightforward reasons. They are well engineered, nicely designed, and utterly reliable. Anker backs their products with exceptional support and customer service, and their descriptions are accurate and without exaggeration or deceptive sales nonsense. This device, compact and covered with a soft matte black coating, charges everything I own to full charge. This includes: iPad, iPod Touch , Nexus 7, Galaxy Tab S 8.4 and 10.1, HTC One M8, Xperia z3 and two generations of Kindles, plus misc calculators and other devices. It works well, is compact, sturdy and well worth the money. A no-brainer purchase if you need charging in a simple, uncomplicated solution (a day who doesn't).
customer_reviews.author: seblick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 months to charge multiple devices and I can say its definatley worth buying. At once I have charged 2 galaxy s10+, 2 galaxy watch active 2, and 2 different tablets. Everything charged quickly and without any problems. Fantastic usb multi charger
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brier

customer_reviews.title: Space saving and fast charging!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting sick of unplugging plugs to charge my phone/watch due to not enough hubs. I finally gave in and made the purchase, and I’m so glad. This usb wall charger is space saving and it charges pretty fast. I liked it so much, I have just purchased another one for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: This is it my friends!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don’t understand why they don’t just build new apartments/house with USB port along with the outlet ports but anyway here’s my review. I love this product!! I can charge my watch, iPhone, AirPods all in one spot. Great for travel, you don’t have to go searching for wall plugs or making sure you have enough boxes to plug the usb in! Just bring all your cables and boom you are all set!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-port auto-sense charger for USB devices
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much, I got 2 more. my 2 6-ports are now for travel, and a 10-port for the house. Fantastic find, lasted well over a year already. Note: The only USB-powered device I found in 3 years that won't charge is a Symbol Wireless Barcode Scanner. It needs a signal to start charging. otherwise, every other device of all types that charge at 5V works fine on these devices. Very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: aj4mq

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this charging station to take on a cruise. My wife and I were able to keep all of our phones, tablets, and headphones charged with only this one device. So much better than having multiple charging blocks. I am going to buy a second one for my office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Another Anker success story
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to purchase multi-port charger because there are soooo many to choose from. However, this was not only a good choice, but the perfect choice for me. The fact that the unit itself doesn't plug into an outlet, but has a detachable plug allowing for a range of placement options, is absolutely awesome! Sturdy design, solid feel, and a great price makes this a perfect purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: You can always trust Anker!
customer_reviews.text: When I am searching for accessories and an Anchor product appears I know I have very likely found the right product. Always high quality, always looks professional. Don't look any farther, if it fits the application there simply isn't going to be anything better.
customer_reviews.author: prc

customer_reviews.title: Work's great
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional charging power. It's just a tad on the big size for traveling, depending on the room you have. The cord unplugging from it definitely helps with storage for traveling. Because the cord unplugs I gave it five stars for traveling. So far it is working great and doing everything it says. It got just a little warm charging two larger items at the same time that required a little longer to charge. I've always heard heat is the worse enemy of Lithium batteries, so I always aim a small fan anyways when charging something. So I keep everything cooler anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Consistent
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for vacations and the family wants to charge their devices all at once. I use it at the house but it comes in hand when we're traveling. I put velcro on it and stuck it to the side of my desk, the cord is long enough to place on a wall outlet as well. Thanks Anker for always making great products!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The charger was packaged like the company believed in what they were doing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a USB wall charger expecting to receive it, plug it up, and forget about it. What I received was a piece of equipment that ANKER has put al out of time and passion into. The charger was packaged like the company believed in what they were doing. After open it and be thanked immediately, I was amazed at the quality construction. The finish is a durable mat style and the cord that goes to the wall is robust. ANKER, you have a customer for life. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Poe

customer_reviews.title: I love this little box.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little box. I bought it for my nightstand back in December to plug in my iPhone, Kindle, and Apple Watch. I am currently using 3 of the 6 ports, but plan to get Air Pods and will be adding to it. I have not had any issues with items not charging or any of the ports not working. So far it has been perfect. It came with double-sided adhesive strip and I mounted it to the back of my nightstand, so it stays hidden.
customer_reviews.author: A TIBBETTS

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've bought. I gave my first to a family member when I was visiting them and then ordered another for myself. I love it. I take it with me on trips so that my wife and I can charge all our devices quickly and easily. Much easier and faster than using individual plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rusten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charger
customer_reviews.text: I have several drivers that uses USB cables and these are the best chargers. I have tried the plug in wall chargesr but your cable has to go to the plug and you have to basically have table sitting right at wall plug to sit your devises on . These one you got nice long cord and your have more cord length along with cable length to help you in charging and positioning your devises while they are being charged . Love it , would recommend it if you have several devises to charge at one time .
customer_reviews.author: Carole Fairris

customer_reviews.title: Fast Charger, Some Ports Failed
customer_reviews.text: The first few days, we loved this unit. It charged our phones so fast that my teen actually started plugging his phone in at the kitchen instead of in his room. However, over the first couple of weeks 2 of the 6 ports failed. We just put scotch tape over them and have continued to use the other ports, and they've remained working (~6 months now). We charge a Samsung tablet, multiple generations of Samsung Galaxy phones, a Droid Razr, and multiple generations of kindles on it. We mostly use 1 ft. cables. 2 ft would be ideal, but don't seem to be available. That many 3 ft cables in a small space causes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Will not let you down
customer_reviews.text: Use this at work to charge my phone and all my flashlights. I can have all plugs on and powered and have been for over a month now never skipped a beat and had to order some more for the house and family. Thanks Anker I solely use only your products and will continue to forever.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marin II

customer_reviews.title: Field Tech Worthy
customer_reviews.text: I take this out to jobs and charge multiple devices at once. I have a couple of vapes, phone, and some extra power banks I can charge with this all at once. The 60W version is super rugged, has a nice LED power indicator on it. I haven't tripped it or had it shut off a USB port on me yet, but it works every time I use it. Anker makes great stuff. This included.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Anker has this best chargers, and this is no exception. I can charge four phones at the same time and use ampere app to verify they are all getting optimal charge. Make sure you use good cables with this product, and you will love the quick charge.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Unit
customer_reviews.text: Anker is the best! This is smaller than I expected which is good. I have a small drone that has a lot of charging cables for the drone, the remote, the lights, etc. This allows one hub in a small package that is easy to transport. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Massaro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second one of these. This hub has just the right amount of ports, with a well-built housing that doesn't feel like it will fall apart. The plug is nice and long, and fits into the hub securely. With some other hubs I've used, you can tell that it will dilute the power going to each port if more devices are plugged in, but not with this beast.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love Anker multi-port USB smart chargers!
customer_reviews.text: This is 4th multi-port USB wall charger I’ve bought, and 2nd from Anker - because the brand is more solidly built & reliable at charging over months/years than others. I have also bought 3 Anker multi-port USB car chargers (draw power from cigarette lighter socket) for road trips (heck, I use one in my car, daily). Now we can take the older 5-port Anker charger on trips, for use at hotels, without unplugging this new 6-port from it’s job at home!
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: A must for those with many USB chargers
customer_reviews.text: I tend to have a lot of devices that needs charging, from tablets to phones and other micro-usb input devices such as fans and this had helped me save so much space. Before, I would have one charger for each device, which took up a lot of space and outlets. Now most of my stuff is just off of this charger and surprisingly, it gives the required amount to each device and not too much or too little. The device is quite compact and wall outlet cable is long enough that you can place it far away from the wall outlet if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Trinh Le

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: As it says; very impressed. This is for charging items not for data transfer. I use this as a powerstation to charge all my bike sensors. Specifically I got this to charge my Garmin 820 and the VARIA lights which didn't charge on a typical data transfer hub or using up a whole power strip with chargers which then you need the usb chargers for the cables anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling and using on your work desk
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling or using on your desk. It can handle all type of devices the only issue I had with it was the blue light that lets you know its plugged, when I put it on my bedside shelf its a bit too bright, nothing some duck tape couldn't solve though.
customer_reviews.author: Martin P

customer_reviews.title: Charges devices fast.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I buy now is anker chargers whether it’s for Home or Auto this particular charger is great I can just put multiple USB plugs in and charge whatever device I need iPad, iPhone, apple watch etc. and not have to worry about multiple blocks being plugged inTo the wall all around my room
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, general-purpose charger
customer_reviews.text: Good charge rate and tons of outlets but apparently no "fancy" fast charging. If your device needs that, you shoulda brought that charger with you! :-) I must say Anker has made a great name for themselves and I find myself happily sometimes paying a premium to get their products.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier version of this (40 watt) and it was fine. It was purchased when we had the older iPads and older phones. We have updated our toys so I was finding that it was taking longer to charge all the new ones. This solved the problem. Original charger is still working so it will become our travel charger.
customer_reviews.author: RGB

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, but description is misleading -- 60W of cumulative power, not 60W per port
customer_reviews.text: The product description is very misleading here: "Ultra Powerful: 6 ports pump out 60 watts of power, enabling simultaneous multi-device charging." This is 60W of CUMULATIVE POWER, meaning no single port will charge at over 10-15W. This is fine for mobile devices and most tablets, but not for notebooks/laptops. Chromebooks, Mbpro's, etc. WILL ALL SEE THIS AS A LOW POWER CHARGER AND CHARGE @ 15W MAX. Other than that, it's a great charger. It would be great if Anker/Amazon could be more clear in the description.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mack

customer_reviews.title: 6 port USB-A wall charger
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these on my desk to charge my phone, my iPad, my watch, etc. It works great for travel too -- hotels never seem to have enough outlets, but I get 6 from 1 with this. I liked it so much, I bought another for work.
customer_reviews.author: David Koski
